name: Data Analyst
description:
Telesphor Software looks for Data Analyst to make the team even greater! We are a successful IT company developing our own products and covering the entire range of services in software development, system integration, and a full cycle of web development.

Responsibilities:

  • Developing visual reports and dashboards.
  • Designing mockups of dashboards and creating Proof of Concept presentations.
  • Designing narrative presentations for clients about their Data Value Chain and BI solutions.
  • Interviewing stakeholders to formalize business needs in the requirements documentation.
  • Assisting with metrics definition and design for various perspectives.
  • Analyzing business processes to indicate the crucial Data Points for measurement of business goals, customer experience, client behavior.
  • Analyzing the Data sources and designing the Data models for the business processes performance review.
  • Structuring data and writing specifications for ETL pipelines.

Requirements:

  • 3+ years of working experience.
  • Knowledge of internal business processes of any kind of industry.
  • Basic understanding of Data Warehouse and ETL Principles.
  • English skills sufficient for fluent spoken communication.
  • Strong analytical and problem solving skills.

We offer:

  • Large, complex and extremely interesting projects in unique business spheres.
  • Decent income (discussed at the interview).
  • English classes in the office.
  • Health insurance
  • Modern office with picture windows and comfortable kitchen with coffee machine and cookies.
  • Easy car and bike parking.
  • Team-building and corporate events.

We are waiting for your CV!
